name: ytptube
tagline: A simple interface for managing YouTube downloads
description: ytptube is a self-hosted interface and automation tool for downloading and organizing YouTube content, exposing a simple web UI and configuration for recurring downloads.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage subscriptions, view download history, and configure settings through a clean web interface

features.title: Download Scheduling
features.description: Set specific times for downloads to run to avoid peak network usage hours

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Define preferred video quality and format settings per channel or globally

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Automatically organize downloaded videos into folders by channel, date, or custom patterns

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Save video descriptions, upload dates, and channel information alongside downloaded files
